A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: At more than one point in this film I finally understood what it must have been like to watch The Empire Strikes Back in the theatre on opening night. My jaw was on the floor! Definitely worth a second watch (and a third\, and a fourth...) because it's easy to miss the subtler themes in the face of all that spectacle. The Last Jedi has managed the near impossible - knocked Empire off the top of my personal rankings. It's divisive and I can see why some of the choices made are controversial - but I guarantee that it will be looked on in hindsight as one of the very best of the saga.
